trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Lansing Charter Township
There were no other sightings in Lansing Charter Township on or around October 24th 2011
divs: sighting detailsabout 9:30 p.m. on 10\24\11, went out on my front porch to look directly above to see a red non-reflective cloud-like 'mist' (i say this because you could see through it...there were airplanes flying in the sky that were flying well above the area of 'mist' and you could see them through the red in the sky. there were actually two of the same type of red cloud-like are--one was on the north east side and the other was on the north west side of the sky. the only areas that were 'misty' were the two red areas. the rest of the sky was crystal clear--no clouds only sky and stars. when i stepped outside and faced north, the red 'mist' that was on the north west side of the sky was in one spot and when i stepped back inside for just a second, and came back outside, it had moved quite a bit to the left. the person i was with said that this movement had also happened just prior to me coming outside to see it for the first time. perhaps it is was the aurora borialis? it began to fade and eventually faded to the point where you couldn't really see it anymore. i tried to locate the source and drove around for a while, but there was nothing that would have explained the light. it appeared to be coming down from the sky rather than a light that was reflecting upward into the sky, which can sometimes cause a reflection against the clouds, but again there were no clouds only these two 'misty' red areas. we took a few pictures, but i don't know if anything showed up on the images as of yet.
